name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Mark_of_Supremacy_A
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Mark of Supremacy A
display_fullname: Boosts.Superior Attuned Mark of Supremacy A
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% . This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.
